title: Love In The Air
description: Paperback. Pub Date :2011-02-04 432 English Harper Perennial A hugely romantic debut novel about love and destiny 'Love in the Air' is set in New York City and tells the story of a young man. named Peter Russell and a young woman named Holly Edwards.Peter works for a prestigious financial firm on Wall Street. and Holly teaches Latin at a private girls school - when they sit next to each other on a plane journey. an intoxicating tale of romance. coincidence and thwarted plans starts to unfold.Other characters Jonathan Speedwell. an extremely handsome writer who is also Hollys husband. Peters best friend and. crucially. a cad; Charlotte Montague. Peters rather tiresome and pretentious wife; Arthur Beeche. the dignified . formal and very. very rich proprietor of the firm where Peter works; Julia Montague. Charlottes beautiful. young step-mot...
author: James Collins
